alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:17PM CDT until June 16 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 916 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elba, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Lee, Pine Level, New Haven, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Basin, Danleys Crossroads, Woodland Grove Church and Camp Humming Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
